original_text:
Curse of the Werewolf Megaways
Le leggende popolari hanno sempre esercitato un notevole fascino sulle persone perché il filo che lega realtà e fantasia è sempre molto labile. Una leggenda di origine europea che nel corso degli anni è diventata universale è senza dubbio quella del lupo mannaro, in cui un uomo si trasforma in un lupo assetato di sangue durante le notti di luna piena. Ed è proprio tra le vie di ciottolato di un piccolo villaggio che è ambientata Curse of the Werewolf Megaways. La grafica riprende quella dei cartoni animati, con i personaggi definiti in ogni dettaglio. Anche le espressioni facciali sono talmente realistiche da farci intuire il carattere dei protagonisti. Il comparto musicale poi contribuisce a creare la giusta dose di suspence, mentre le animazioni che si verificano a seguito di ogni vincita ci aiutano ad immergerci ancor di più nella storia.
Caratteristiche principali della slot machine
La griglia di gioco ha 6 rulli e 6 linee di base, numero che cambia in base alle dimensioni del simbolo, che possono variare in modo casuale. I modi per vincere sono ben 46656 e la volatilità è alta, ciò vuol dire che il gioco paga meno di frequente ma quando si vince gli importi sono sempre di un certo livello. La puntata va da un minimo di 0,10 € a un massimo di 100 €. Quando si verificano più vincite sulla stessa linea di pagamento viene pagata solo quella più alta, quando invece le combinazioni vincenti si trovano su linee diverse allora gli importi vengono sommati. Curse of the Werewolf Megaways ha un RTP pari al 96,5% ed è possibile attivare tra i 10 e i 100 giri automatici.
Simboli e funzionalità di Curse of the Werewolf Megaways
Le carte dal 10 all’asso sono i simboli che pagano meno di tutti, seguiti dal nerd col cappellino verde, il locandiere con i baffoni neri, la figlia del locandiere e il giovane con il cappellino marrone. Il lupo mannaro è il simbolo che paga di più in assoluto. Il foglio di pergamena con il graffio del lupo e la scritta Wild rappresenta il Jolly del gioco, sostituisce tutti i simboli regolari ma non quelli speciali. Il lupo al tramonto è il simbolo Mistero, quando compare si trasforma in un altro simbolo pagante dando vita a combinazioni vincenti. Durante il gioco regolare, possono comparire dei simboli impilati che assicurano grandi vincite o può attivarsi uno spin Grande Vincita che garantisce molteplici combinazioni paganti su diverse linee di gioco. Il lupo che ulula alla luna è il simbolo Bonus: quando compare 3 volte si attivano 8 giri gratuiti, con 4 volte i giri saranno 10, con 5 si hanno 12 giri e con 6 si ottengono 15 giri.
Durante i giri gratuiti può apparire il simbolo del lupo mannaro con sfondo dorato, in tal caso i simboli regolari vengono rimossi e rimpiazzati dal simbolo del lupo, inoltre si ha diritto a un giro gratuito aggiuntivo.

raw_translation.response:
Curse of the Werewolf Megaways

Legendary tales have always held a great fascination for people because the line between reality and fantasy is always very thin. A European legend that has become universal over the years is undoubtedly that of the werewolf, in which a man transforms into a bloodthirsty wolf during full moon nights. And it is precisely among the cobblestone streets of a small village that Curse of the Werewolf Megaways is set. The graphics resemble those of cartoons, with characters defined in every detail. Even facial expressions are so realistic as to give us an idea of the protagonists' character. The musical aspect contributes to creating the right amount of suspense, while the animations that occur after each win help us to immerse ourselves even more in the story.

Main features of the slot machine

The game grid has 6 reels and 6 baseline lines, a number that changes based on the size of the symbol, which can vary randomly. There are 46,656 ways to win and the volatility is high, meaning that the game pays less frequently, but when you win, the amounts are always at a certain level. The bet ranges from a minimum of €0.10 to a maximum of €100. When more wins occur on the same payline, only the highest one is paid out, whereas when winning combinations are found on different lines, the amounts are added up. Curse of the Werewolf Megaways has an RTP of 96.5% and up to 10 to 100 auto-spins can be activated.

Symbols and functionalities of Curse of the Werewolf Megaways

The cards from 10 to Ace are the symbols that pay the least of all, followed by the nerd with the green cap, the innkeeper with the black mustache, the innkeeper's daughter, and the young man with the brown cap. The werewolf is the highest-paying symbol of all. The parchment with the scratch of the wolf and the Wild writing represents the game's wild card, replacing all regular symbols but not the special ones. The wolf at sunset is the Mystery symbol, and when it appears, it transforms into another paying symbol, creating winning combinations. During regular play, stacked symbols can appear, guaranteeing big wins, or a Big Win Spin can be activated, which guarantees multiple paying combinations on different game lines. The howling wolf at the moon is the Bonus symbol: when it appears 3 times, 8 free spins are activated, with 4 times there will be 10 spins, with 5 there will be 12 spins, and with 6, there will be 15 spins.

During free spins, the golden-backed werewolf symbol may appear, and in that case, regular symbols are removed and replaced by the wolf symbol, and you are entitled to an additional free spin.

Legendary tales have always held a great fascination for people because the line between reality and fantasy is always very thin. And it is precisely among the cobblestone streets of a small village that Curse of the Werewolf Megaways is set. The graphics resemble those of cartoons, with characters defined in every detail. Main features of the slot machine

There are 46,656 ways to win and the volatility is high, meaning that the game pays less frequently, but when you win, the amounts are always at a certain level. The werewolf is the highest-paying symbol of all. The wolf at sunset is the Mystery symbol, and when it appears, it transforms into another paying symbol, creating winning combinations. The howling wolf at the moon is the Bonus symbol: when it appears 3 times, 8 free spins are activated, with 4 times there will be 10 spins, with 5 there will be 12 spins, and with 6, there will be 15 spins.

Curse of the Werewolf Megaways features 6 reels and 6 baseline lines that change based on the size of the symbol. The game has 46,656 ways to win and is highly volatile, meaning that although wins occur less frequently, they offer higher payouts. Players can activate up to 10 to 100 auto-spins and can bet a minimum of €0.10 to a maximum of €100.

Betting Options

Curse of the Werewolf Megaways allows for a wide range of betting options, with a minimum bet of €0.10 and a maximum of €100. Although the game pays less frequently, the payouts are always at a certain level, making it an exciting gaming option for players of all levels.

Symbols and Wilds

The symbols vary from cards 10 to Ace, the nerd with the green cap, the innkeeper with the black mustache, the innkeeper's daughter, the young man with the brown cap, and the werewolf. The parchment with the scratch of the wolf and the Wild writing represents the game's wild card, replacing all regular symbols but not the special ones. During regular play, stacked symbols can appear, guaranteeing big wins, or a Big Win Spin can be activated, which guarantees multiple paying combinations on different game lines. 

Free Spins

When players land the howling wolf at the moon symbol 3, 4, 5, or 6 times, they activate 8, 10, 12, or 15 free spins, respectively. During free spins, the golden-backed werewolf symbol may appear, and in that case, regular symbols are removed and replaced by the wolf symbol, allowing players to earn additional free spins. The free spins feature adds a thrilling layer to the gameplay and can offer impressive payouts for lucky players.

RTP and Graphics

Curse of the Werewolf Megaways has an RTP of 96.5%, making it more lucrative than some other slot games. The graphics resemble those of cartoons, with characters defined in every detail. Even facial expressions are so realistic as to give us an idea of the protagonists' character. The musical aspect contributes to creating the right amount of suspense, while the animations after each win help us to immerse ourselves even more in the story. Overall, the game offers a visually stunning and exciting gaming experience for slot enthusiasts.

Curse of the Werewolf Megaways has an RTP of 96.5% and up to 10 to 100 auto-spins can be activated.

Symbols and functionalities of Curse of the Werewolf Megaways
